import React from 'react'; import styles from "./Form.module.scss"; import Input from "../Input/Input"; import Button from "../Button/Button"; import Title from "../Title/Title"; const types = { link: 'link', article: 'article', note: 'note', } const descriptions = { link: 'favorite Twitter account', article: 'Article', note: 'Note', } class Form extends React.Component { state={ activeOption: types.link, } handleChangeRadio = (type) => { this.setState({ activeOption: type, }) } render(){ return (
Add new {descriptions[this.state.activeOption]}
this.handleChangeRadio(types.links)} checked={this.state.activeOption === types.links} /> this.handleChangeRadio(types.articles)} /> this.handleChangeRadio(types.notes)} /> {/*
